channel.title: git on linchun's 3am thoughts
channel.description: Recent content in git on linchun's 3am thoughts

item.title: on version control
item.description: I used to fear the use of git, especially on projects that involved multiple stakeholders with no protection. Fast forward to today, I version control all of my projects (dotfiles, blogs, school work, tutorials etc…) and I’m no longer afraid to work through merge conflicts and rebases. It all started with me trying to understand more about git, through Git Pro. It is a book filled with insights and probably the most underrated book I’ve ever read thus far.
